verses.name: Jeremiah 36:16
verses.text: Now it came to pass, when they had heard all the words, they were afraid both one and other, and said unto Baruch, We will surely tell the king of all these words.

verses.name: Jeremiah 36:17
verses.text: And they asked Baruch, saying, Tell us now, How didst thou write all these words at his mouth?

verses.name: Jeremiah 36:18
verses.text: Then Baruch answered them, He pronounced all these words unto me with his mouth, and I wrote them with ink in the book.

verses.name: Jeremiah 36:19
verses.text: Then said the princes unto Baruch, Go, hide thee, thou and Jeremiah; and let no man know where ye be.
